configuration:
{% if kerberos_enabled %}
yarn.resourcemanager.principal rm/_HOST@TEST.ORG
yarn.resourcemanager.keytab /share/keytabs/{{ node.name }}/rm.service.keytab
yarn.nodemanager.principal nm/_HOST@TEST.ORG
yarn.nodemanager.keytab /share/keytabs/{{ node.name }}/nm.service.keytab
{% endif %}
yarn.resourcemanager.address hadoop-master1.orb.local:8032
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services mapreduce_shuffle,spark_shuffle
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services.mapreduce_shuffle.class org.apache.hadoop.mapred.ShuffleHandler
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services.spark_shuffle.classpath /opt/spark/yarn/*
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services.spark_shuffle.class org.apache.spark.network.yarn.YarnShuffleService
spark.shuffle.service.port 7001
yarn.log-aggregation-enable true
yarn.dispatcher.exit-on-error true
yarn.nodemanager.local-dirs /var/lib/hadoop-yarn/cache/${user.name}/nm-local-dir List of directories to store localized files in.
yarn.nodemanager.log-dirs /var/log/hadoop-yarn/containers
yarn.nodemanager.remote-app-log-dir /var/log/hadoop-yarn/apps
yarn.application.classpath
/etc/hadoop/conf, /opt/hadoop/share/hadoop/common/*, /opt/hadoop/share/hadoop/common/lib/*, /opt/hadoop/share/hadoop/hdfs/*, /opt/hadoop/share/hadoop/hdfs/lib/*, /opt/hadoop/share/hadoop/yarn/*, /opt/hadoop/share/hadoop/yarn/lib/*
yarn.resourcemanager.hostname hadoop-master1.orb.local
yarn.nodemanager.disk-health-checker.max-disk-utilization-per-disk-percentage 100
yarn.nodemanager.pmem-check-enabled false
yarn.nodemanager.vmem-check-enabled false
yarn.nodemanager.resource.memory.enforced false
yarn.nodemanager.elastic-memory-control.enabled false
yarn.log.server.url http://hadoop-master1.orb.local:19888/jobhistory/logs
yarn.scheduler.minimum-allocation-mb 256
